sourcesContent:
"use client"

import { useState } from "react"

const FoodPage = () => {
    const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("deluxe")
    const [cartCount, setCartCount] = useState(0)
    const [showAlert, setShowAlert] = useState(false)
    const [alertMessage, setAlertMessage] = useState("")

    // Food categories
    const categories = [
        { id: "deluxe", name: "Deluxe (Regular)", icon: "üëë" },
        { id: "premium", name: "New Premium Burgers", icon: "‚≠ê" },
        { id: "korean", name: "Korean Spicy Fest", icon: "üå∂Ô∏è" },
        { id: "whopper", name: "Original Whopper Collection", icon: "üçî" },
        { id: "monsoon", name: "Monsoon Mania Savers", icon: "üåßÔ∏è" },
        { id: "fusion", name: "NEW BK Fusion (Masala)", icon: "üî•" },
        { id: "value", name: "Value Meals", icon: "üí∞" },
    ]

    // Food items for each category
    const foodItems = {
        deluxe: [
            {
                id: 1,
                name: "BK Veggie Burger Meal",
                description: "2 BK Veggie Burger + Saucy Fries + 2 Cookie Crunch Sundae",
                price: "‚Çπ1035/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 2,
                name: "BK Chicken Burger Meal",
                description: "2 BK Chicken Burger + Saucy Fries + 2 Cookie Crunch Sundae",
                price: "‚Çπ1075/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 3,
                name: "Veg Whopper Meal",
                description: "2 Veg Whopper + Saucy Fries + 2 Cookie Crunch Sundae",
                price: "‚Çπ1195/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 4,
                name: "Chicken Whopper Meal",
                description: "2 Chicken Whopper + Saucy Fries + 2 Cookie Crunch Sundae",
                price: "‚Çπ1215/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 5,
                name: "Kings Veg Meal",
                description: "2 Hot 'N' Saucy Burger + Saucy Fries + 2 Cookie Crunch Sundae",
                price: "‚Çπ995/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 6,
                name: "Double Cheese Burger Meal",
                description: "2 Double Cheese Burger + Saucy Fries + 2 Cookie Crunch Sundae",
                price: "‚Çπ1155/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
        ],
        premium: [
            {
                id: 7,
                name: "Premium Chicken Deluxe",
                description: "Premium Chicken Burger + Crispy Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1299/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 8,
                name: "Premium Veg Supreme",
                description: "Premium Veg Burger + Crispy Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1199/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 9,
                name: "BBQ Bacon Burger",
                description: "BBQ Bacon Burger + Onion Rings + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1399/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 10,
                name: "Mushroom Swiss Burger",
                description: "Mushroom Swiss Burger + Crispy Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1249/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 11,
                name: "Spicy Chicken Premium",
                description: "Spicy Chicken Burger + Jalape√±o Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1349/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
        ],
        korean: [
            {
                id: 12,
                name: "Korean Spicy Chicken",
                description: "Korean Style Spicy Chicken Burger + Kimchi Fries + Korean Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1199/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 13,
                name: "Korean Veg Delight",
                description: "Korean Style Veg Burger + Spicy Fries + Korean Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1099/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 14,
                name: "Bulgogi Burger",
                description: "Bulgogi Style Burger + Korean Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1299/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 15,
                name: "Kimchi Chicken Burger",
                description: "Kimchi Chicken Burger + Spicy Wedges + Korean Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1249/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 16,
                name: "Korean BBQ Veg",
                description: "Korean BBQ Veg Burger + Crispy Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1149/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
        ],
        whopper: [
            {
                id: 17,
                name: "Classic Whopper",
                description: "Original Whopper + Regular Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ899/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 18,
                name: "Veg Whopper Classic",
                description: "Veg Whopper + Regular Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ799/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 19,
                name: "Double Whopper",
                description: "Double Whopper + Large Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1199/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 20,
                name: "Whopper Jr.",
                description: "Whopper Jr. + Small Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ699/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 21,
                name: "Cheese Whopper",
                description: "Cheese Whopper + Regular Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ949/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
        ],
        monsoon: [
            {
                id: 22,
                name: "Monsoon Special Veg",
                description: "Special Veg Burger + Masala Fries + Masala Chai",
                price: "‚Çπ799/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 23,
                name: "Rainy Day Chicken",
                description: "Spicy Chicken Burger + Hot Fries + Hot Coffee",
                price: "‚Çπ899/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 24,
                name: "Monsoon Combo",
                description: "Mix Veg Burger + Onion Rings + Hot Chocolate",
                price: "‚Çπ849/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 25,
                name: "Thunder Chicken",
                description: "Thunder Chicken Burger + Spicy Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ949/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 26,
                name: "Cloudy Veg Delight",
                description: "Cloudy Veg Burger + Regular Fries + Lemonade",
                price: "‚Çπ749/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
        ],
        fusion: [
            {
                id: 27,
                name: "Masala Chicken Fusion",
                description: "Masala Chicken Burger + Tandoori Fries + Lassi",
                price: "‚Çπ1099/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 28,
                name: "Paneer Tikka Fusion",
                description: "Paneer Tikka Burger + Masala Fries + Mango Lassi",
                price: "‚Çπ999/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 29,
                name: "Butter Chicken Burger",
                description: "Butter Chicken Burger + Naan Chips + Buttermilk",
                price: "‚Çπ1149/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 30,
                name: "Chole Bhature Burger",
                description: "Chole Bhature Burger + Pickle Fries + Chaas",
                price: "‚Çπ899/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 31,
                name: "Tandoori Chicken Fusion",
                description: "Tandoori Chicken Burger + Mint Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ1049/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
        ],
        value: [
            {
                id: 32,
                name: "Value Veg Burger",
                description: "Simple Veg Burger + Small Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ499/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 33,
                name: "Value Chicken Burger",
                description: "Simple Chicken Burger + Small Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ599/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 34,
                name: "Mini Meal Deal",
                description: "Mini Burger + Onion Rings + Small Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ449/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
            {
                id: 35,
                name: "Student Special",
                description: "Student Burger + Regular Fries + Cold Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ549/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: false,
            },
            {
                id: 36,
                name: "Budget Combo",
                description: "Budget Burger + Small Fries + Soft Drink",
                price: "‚Çπ399/-",
                image: "/placeholder.svg?height=120&width=120",
                isVeg: true,
            },
        ],
    }

    const handleAddToCart = (itemName) => {
        setCartCount(cartCount + 1)
        setAlertMessage(`${itemName} added to cart!`)
        setShowAlert(true)
        setTimeout(() => {
            setShowAlert(false)
        }, 2000)
    }

    const handleBackToHome = () => {
        alert("Navigating back to Student Home Page...")
    }

    const styles = {
        container: {
            minHeight: "100vh",
            background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #0f172a, #1e293b)",
            fontFamily: "system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif",
            color: "white",
        },
        header: {
            background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6, #10b981)",
            padding: "1rem",
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "space-between",
            boxShadow: "0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)",
            position: "sticky",
            top: 0,
            zIndex: 50,
        },
        backButton: {
            background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)",
            border: "none",
            borderRadius: "50%",
            width: "40px",
            height: "40px",
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "center",
            cursor: "pointer",
            color: "white",
            fontSize: "1.25rem",
            transition: "all 0.3s ease",
        },
        headerTitle: {
            fontSize: "1.5rem",
            fontWeight: "bold",
            color: "white",
            margin: 0,
        },
        cartContainer: {
            position: "relative",
            background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)",
            borderRadius: "50%",
            width: "40px",
            height: "40px",
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "center",
            cursor: "pointer",
        },
        cartIcon: {
            fontSize: "1.25rem",
            color: "white",
        },
        cartBadge: {
            position: "absolute",
            top: "-8px",
            right: "-8px",
            background: "#ef4444",
            color: "white",
            borderRadius: "50%",
            width: "20px",
            height: "20px",
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "center",
            fontSize: "0.75rem",
            fontWeight: "bold",
        },
        mainContent: {
            display: "flex",
            minHeight: "calc(100vh - 80px)",
        },
        sidebar: {
            width: "280px",
            background: "rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.95)",
            backdropFilter: "blur(12px)",
            borderRight: "1px solid #475569",
            padding: "1rem 0",
            overflowY: "auto",
        },
        categoryItem: {
            padding: "1rem 1.5rem",
            cursor: "pointer",
            transition: "all 0.3s ease",
            borderLeft: "4px solid transparent",
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            gap: "0.75rem",
        },
        categoryItemActive: {
            background: "linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.2), rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.2))",
            borderLeftColor: "#60a5fa",
            color: "#60a5fa",
        },
        categoryIcon: {
            fontSize: "1.25rem",
        },
        categoryName: {
            fontSize: "0.95rem",
            fontWeight: 500,
        },
        contentArea: {
            flex: 1,
            padding: "2rem",
            overflowY: "auto",
        },
        toggleContainer: {
            display: "flex",
            gap: "1rem",
            marginBottom: "2rem",
            justifyContent: "center",
        },
        toggle: {
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            gap: "0.5rem",
            background: "rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8)",
            padding: "0.75rem 1rem",
            borderRadius: "2rem",
            border: "1px solid #475569",
        },
        toggleActive: {
            background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981, #3b82f6)",
            borderColor: "#10b981",
        },
        itemsGrid: {
            display: "grid",
            gap: "1.5rem",
        },
        foodItem: {
            background: "rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8)",
            backdropFilter: "blur(12px)",
            borderRadius: "1rem",
            padding: "1.5rem",
            border: "1px solid #475569",
            display: "flex",
            gap: "1.5rem",
            transition: "all 0.3s ease",
        },
        foodImage: {
            width: "120px",
            height: "120px",
            borderRadius: "0.75rem",
            objectFit: "cover",
            flexShrink: 0,
        },
        foodDetails: {
            flex: 1,
            display: "flex",
            flexDirection: "column",
            justifyContent: "space-between",
        },
        foodHeader: {
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "flex-start",
            justifyContent: "space-between",
            marginBottom: "0.5rem",
        },
        foodName: {
            fontSize: "1.25rem",
            fontWeight: "bold",
            color: "white",
            margin: 0,
        },
        vegIndicator: {
            width: "20px",
            height: "20px",
            borderRadius: "4px",
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "center",
            fontSize: "0.75rem",
            fontWeight: "bold",
            flexShrink: 0,
        },
        vegIndicatorVeg: {
            background: "#10b981",
            color: "white",
        },
        vegIndicatorNonVeg: {
            background: "#ef4444",
            color: "white",
        },
        foodDescription: {
            color: "#cbd5e1",
            fontSize: "0.95rem",
            lineHeight: 1.5,
            marginBottom: "1rem",
        },
        foodFooter: {
            display: "flex",
            alignItems: "center",
            justifyContent: "space-between",
        },
        foodPrice: {
            fontSize: "1.5rem",
            fontWeight: "bold",
            color: "#60a5fa",
        },
        addButton: {
            background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #ef4444, #dc2626)",
            border: "none",
            borderRadius: "2rem",
            padding: "0.75rem 1.5rem",
            color: "white",
            fontSize: "1rem",
            fontWeight: "bold",
            cursor: "pointer",
            transition: "all 0.3s ease",
            textTransform: "uppercase",
            letterSpacing: "0.05em",
        },
        alert: {
            position: "fixed",
            top: "100px",
            left: "50%",
            transform: "translateX(-50%)",
            background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981, #059669)",
            color: "white",
            padding: "1rem 2rem",
            borderRadius: "2rem",
            boxShadow: "0 8px 25px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.4)",
            zIndex: 100,
            fontSize: "1rem",
            fontWeight: "bold",
            opacity: showAlert ? 1 : 0,
            visibility: showAlert ? "visible" : "hidden",
            transition: "all 0.3s ease",
        },
    }

    const handleCategoryHover = (e, isHover) => {
        if (isHover) {
            e.currentTarget.style.background = "linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1), rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1))"
            e.currentTarget.style.transform = "translateX(4px)"
        } else if (!e.currentTarget.classList.contains("active")) {
            e.currentTarget.style.background = "transparent"
            e.currentTarget.style.transform = "translateX(0)"
        }
    }

    const handleAddButtonHover = (e, isHover) => {
        if (isHover) {
            e.target.style.transform = "translateY(-2px) scale(1.05)"
            e.target.style.boxShadow = "0 8px 20px rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.4)"
        } else {
            e.target.style.transform = "translateY(0) scale(1)"
            e.target.style.boxShadow = "none"
        }
    }

    const handleBackButtonHover = (e, isHover) => {
        if (isHover) {
            e.target.style.background = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)"
            e.target.style.transform = "scale(1.1)"
        } else {
            e.target.style.background = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)"
            e.target.style.transform = "scale(1)"
        }
    }

    const handleFoodItemHover = (e, isHover) => {
        if (isHover) {
            e.currentTarget.style.transform = "translateY(-4px)"
            e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = "0 12px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)"
            e.currentTarget.style.borderColor = "#60a5fa"
        } else {
            e.currentTarget.style.transform = "translateY(0)"
            e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = "none"
            e.currentTarget.style.borderColor = "#475569"
        }
    }

    return (
        <div style={styles.container}>
            {/* Alert */}
            <div style={styles.alert}>{alertMessage}</div>

            {/* Header */}
            <header style={styles.header}>
                <button
                    style={styles.backButton}
                    onClick={handleBackToHome}
                    onMouseEnter={(e) => handleBackButtonHover(e, true)}
                    onMouseLeave={(e) => handleBackButtonHover(e, false)}
                >
                    ‚Üê
                </button>
                <h1 style={styles.headerTitle}>DSCE Food Menu</h1>
                <div style={styles.cartContainer}>
                    <span style={styles.cartIcon}>üõí</span>
                    {cartCount > 0 && <span style={styles.cartBadge}>{cartCount}</span>}
                </div>
            </header>

            {/* Main Content */}
            <div style={styles.mainContent}>
                {/* Sidebar */}
                <div style={styles.sidebar}>
                    {categories.map((category) => (
                        <div
                            key={category.id}
                            className={selectedCategory === category.id ? "active" : ""}
                            style={{
                                ...styles.categoryItem,
                                ...(selectedCategory === category.id ? styles.categoryItemActive : {}),
                            }}
                            onClick={() => setSelectedCategory(category.id)}
                            onMouseEnter={(e) => handleCategoryHover(e, true)}
                            onMouseLeave={(e) => handleCategoryHover(e, false)}
                        >
                            <span style={styles.categoryIcon}>{category.icon}</span>
                            <span style={styles.categoryName}>{category.name}</span>
                        </div>
                    ))}
                </div>

                {/* Content Area */}
                <div style={styles.contentArea}>
                    {/* Toggle Switches */}
                    <div style={styles.toggleContainer}>
                        <div style={{ ...styles.toggle, ...styles.toggleActive }}>
                            <span style={{ ...styles.vegIndicator, ...styles.vegIndicatorVeg }}>‚óè</span>
                            <span>Veg</span>
                        </div>
                        <div style={{ ...styles.toggle, ...styles.toggleActive }}>
                            <span style={{ ...styles.vegIndicator, ...styles.vegIndicatorNonVeg }}>‚ñ≤</span>
                            <span>Non-Veg</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Food Items */}
                    <div style={styles.itemsGrid}>
                        {foodItems[selectedCategory]?.map((item) => (
                            <div
                                key={item.id}
                                style={styles.foodItem}
                                onMouseEnter={(e) => handleFoodItemHover(e, true)}
                                onMouseLeave={(e) => handleFoodItemHover(e, false)}
                            >
                                <img src={item.image || "/placeholder.svg"} alt={item.name} style={styles.foodImage} />
                                <div style={styles.foodDetails}>
                                    <div>
                                        <div style={styles.foodHeader}>
                                            <h3 style={styles.foodName}>{item.name}</h3>
                                            <div
                                                style={{
                                                    ...styles.vegIndicator,
                                                    ...(item.isVeg ? styles.vegIndicatorVeg : styles.vegIndicatorNonVeg),
                                                }}
                                            >
                                                {item.isVeg ? "‚óè" : "‚ñ≤"}
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <p style={styles.foodDescription}>{item.description}</p>
                                    </div>
                                    <div style={styles.foodFooter}>
                                        <span style={styles.foodPrice}>{item.price}</span>
                                        <button
                                            style={styles.addButton}
                                            onClick={() => handleAddToCart(item.name)}
                                            onMouseEnter={(e) => handleAddButtonHover(e, true)}
                                            onMouseLeave={(e) => handleAddButtonHover(e, false)}
                                        >
                                            Add +
                                        </button>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        ))}
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    )
}

export default FoodPage
